items.markText: “She says it has nothing to do with what you look like, or what you have. It has only to do with what you think of, and what you do.”

users.name: 星星月亮
users.vDesc: 考证不是目的，应用才是真理。

items.markText: The change in her life did not come about gradually, but was made all at once.
